Container.Name: CSMM-7DtD
Container.Overview:
This Docker will install and download CSMM for 7DtD (CatalysmsServerManager). It's a powerfull Server Manager with Server automation, Discord notifications, High ping kicker, Country ban, Player tracking, Ingame commands, Economy system, Discord integration, Support ticket system, Server analytics,... for 7DtD.
UPDATE NOTICE: Simply set the 'Force Update' to 'true' and restart the container (don't forget to turn it off after the update).

It's a powerfull Server Manager with Server automation, Discord notifications, High ping kicker, Country ban, Player tracking, Ingame commands, Economy system, Discord integration, Support ticket system, Server analytics,... for 7DtD.

Config.Name: Hostname
Config.Description: Must be in this exact format: 'https://www.server.org' (without quotes, no path or locations allowed only subdomains and with no trailing '/').

Config.Name: Steam API Key
Config.Description: Steam API Key goes here (you can get it from: https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey).

Config.Name: Dicord Bot Token
Config.Description: Your Discord Bot Token (you can get it from here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications)

Config.Name: Discord Client Secret
Config.Description: Your Discord Client Secret (you can get it from here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications)

Config.Name: Discord Client ID
Config.Description: Your Discord Client ID (you can get it from here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications)

Config.Name: Database Backup Interval
Config.Description: Specify the database backup interval in seconds (saved to the ../Database/7dtd.sql).

Config.Name: Force Update
Config.Description: Set to 'true' to force an update.

Config.Name: Web Port
Config.Description: Please note that you should reverse proxy the server trough nginx, apache or any other reverse proxy software to your Hostname as filled in above.

Config.Name: Maria DB Port
Config.Description: Only needed if you want to connect to the database.

Config.Name: CSMM Download URL
Config.Description: Only change if you are know what you are doing.
